scripts.test:chrome: rmdir /s /q allure-results 2>nul & npx cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.test:edge: rmdir /s /q allure-results 2>nul & npx cypress run --browser edge
scripts.test:firefox: rmdir /s /q allure-results 2>nul & npx cypress run --browser firefox
scripts.report:allure: if exist allure-report\history xcopy allure-report\history allure-results\history /E /I /Y && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
